name: Gearkeeper Construct
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The gearkeeper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Rapid Shifting
traits.desc: Opportunity attacks made against the gearkeeper have disadvantage.

traits.name: Whirling Blades
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the gearkeeper takes 4 (1d8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gearkeeper makes two Arm Blade attacks, or one Arm Blade attack and one Spear Launcher attack.

actions.name: Arm Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear Launcher
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is knocked prone.

actions.name: Shrapnel Blast (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The gearkeeper jettisons a spray of jagged metal in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
